title: The Time of Ninja elements Tier List
description: Discover the definitive tier list for "The Time of Ninja" elements, ranking from S to C Tier. Learn about each element's unique abilities and choose the best fit for your gameplay style.
heading: The Time of Ninja elements Tier List
introText: Discover the definitive tier list for "The Time of Ninja" elements, ranking from S to C Tier. Learn about each element's unique abilities and choose the best fit for your gameplay style.

data.itemDescription: High AoE potential and excellent DPS make it a versatile pick for both 1v1 duels and group fights, with low cooldown skills that are easy to aim
It boasts great range and burst damage along with a balanced mix of AoE and burst attacks, synergizing well with top Family & Clan buffs like Red Eye
Offering a blend of burst and AoE skills plus effective crowd control, it delivers high DPS and defense break capabilities, ideal for Legendary and Fighter families/clans
Similar to Wind but with lower DPS, it provides strong crowd control ideal for team support, though its damage output suffers, especially in 1v1s
Delivers high damage and group crowd control with the ability to stun enemies temporarily, making it good for 1v1 scenarios, but it falls short in team fights
